fi.left2die.ui
Class Slider

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.gameobject.Entity
      fi.left2die.gameobject.MovableEntity
          fi.left2die.ui.Slider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
public class Slider
extends MovableEntity

Slider class is simple slider user interface component to used with Slick2d library.

Author:
TeeMuki

Returns slider's current value. Value is between minimum and maximum values;

Returns:
Returns slider's current value.

setValue

public void setValue(float value)
Set value of slider. If value is greater than max value, value is set to max value or if value is less than min value is set.

Parameters:
value -

setPercent

public void setPercent(float percent)
Set slider's value with given percent. Given value have to between 0 - 100.
